entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
